department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Mike is a dynamic and passionate information technology executive with extensive experience empowering teams to deliver sustainable results.  With over 25 years experience in the field, Mike leverages deep working knowledge of state-of-the-art technologies and industry trends in strategic planning and disaster recovery.  He is also an excellent mentor and coach with a track record of building high-performance teams and robust, reliable and cost-effective technical solutions in support of business requirements. <br><br>Mike has taught a number of courses at Northwestern University's School of Continuing Education.<br><br>Mike has also served as a guest speaker at DePaul University and is the Chairman of the DePaul CDM Advisory Council.
